Package io.github.ai4ci.config.setup

Interface LocationAwareDemography

All Superinterfaces:
DemographicConfiguration, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
AgeStratifiedDemography
@Immutable public interface LocationAwareDemography extends DemographicConfiguration
Location aware demographic configuration.

This interface provides simple helpers for demographies that incorporate spatial information. It defines a proximity based modifier and utility methods used during setup and relationship strength calculation. Implementations are used by the model builder during the setup stage to place people and to inform contact probabilities between agents.

Downstream uses include DefaultModelBuilder.setupOutbreak(io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModifiableOutbreak, io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.SetupConfiguration, io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler) during outbreak construction and the per‑person baseliner which may consult proximity when assigning household or workplace links.

Extension guidance: subclasses may override getRelationshipStrength(io.github.ai4ci.abm.Person, io.github.ai4ci.abm.Person, io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler) to combine alternative spatial kernels or to use data driven lookup tables. Keep heavy data loads in the setup stage rather than per‑person methods.

Author:
Rob Challen

    • DEFAULT

  • Method Details

    • createPersonStub

      default io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModifiablePerson createPersonStub(Outbreak outbreak)
      Create a minimal person stub attached to the supplied outbreak.

      Used by setup helpers that need a quick person object for sampling or placement. Implementations may extend the returned stub further in later stages.

      Specified by:
      createPersonStub in interface DemographicConfiguration
      Parameters:
      outbreak - owning outbreak used to attach the created person
      Returns:
      a modifiable person stub

    • getContactProximityBias

      Double getContactProximityBias()
      Calibrates the strength of association between distance and contact probability. Values above 1 compress contact radius; values below 1 expand it.
      Returns:
      proximity bias applied to base contact odds

    • getRelationshipStrength

      default double getRelationshipStrength(Person source, Person target, Sampler sampler)
      Compute a relationship strength between two people based on spatial proximity.

      The returned value is an odds/probability modifier used by higher level code when composing demographic and location based contact modifiers. Implementations that need alternative kernels should override this method.

      Specified by:
      getRelationshipStrength in interface DemographicConfiguration
      Parameters:
      source - the source person
      target - the target person
      sampler - a sampler for stochastic sampling when required
      Returns:
      a relationship strength used as an odds modifier
